# Copilot Custom Instructions

## Project Context
This repository contains development environment setup guides for Windows and macOS.

## Code Style Preferences
- Use PowerShell for Windows scripts
- Use Bash/Zsh for macOS scripts
- Follow Microsoft documentation standards for Azure CLI commands
- Use clear, descriptive variable names

## Technologies Used
- Git & GitHub CLI
- Azure CLI with ML extension
- .NET SDK 6 and 8
- Azure AI Foundry (AI Hub, AI Projects)
- Azure OpenAI Service
- Python for AI/ML development

## Response Guidelines
- Provide platform-specific commands (Windows/macOS)
- Include error handling in scripts
- Add comments explaining complex operations
- Use `winget` for Windows package management
- Use `brew` for macOS package management
